analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MoldCoinBonus.buyWithBonus (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#347-377):
	External calls:
	- tokens = safeMul(msg.value,fundAddress.price(block.timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#351-352)
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#353-359)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#353-359)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#365-370)
	- bonusBalances (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#370-373)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#362-365)

MoldCoin.price (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#198-212) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeInSeconds <= endDatetime (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#207-210)
	- timeInSeconds < startDatetime (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#198-199)
	- timeInSeconds <= firstStageDatetime (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#199-204)
	- timeInSeconds <= secondStageDatetime (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#204-206)

MoldCoin.buyRecipient (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#222-242) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#227-228)

MoldCoin.allocateFounderTokens (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#243-256) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#244-246)

MoldCoin.arrangeUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#289-311) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#293-297)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#291)
	- require(bool)(balances[holder] > 0) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#300-302)

MoldCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#138)
MoldCoin.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#137)
MoldCoin.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#138)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#1): it allows old versions

Low level call in MoldCoin.buyRecipient (/unique_chucks/32/0x9a51f8fdd2d43c79da4549d452d35970bbefc48f.sol#222-242):
